work.title: SDE 1
work.description: Led the development of dynamic, interactive web pages using React, JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3. Optimized performance by reducing component redundancy, improving code reuse, and enhancing user experience. Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to deliver key features.

work.title: UI Engineer
work.description: Developed and enhanced user interfaces for an Admin Dashboard React project. Implemented new features, optimized performance, and worked collaboratively to meet project goals while ensuring high code quality and efficiency.

work.title: Associate software Intern
